comprehensive.query: (("knee osteoarthritis"[Title/Abstract] OR "knee OA"[Title/Abstract] OR "gonarthrosis"[Title/Abstract] OR "knee arthrosis"[Title/Abstract] OR (knee[Title/Abstract] AND osteoarthritis[Title/Abstract]) OR "Osteoarthritis, Knee"[MeSH]) AND (progression[Title/Abstract] OR "total knee replacement"[Title/Abstract] OR "total knee arthroplasty"[Title/Abstract] OR TKR[Title/Abstract] OR TKA[Title/Abstract] OR "knee replacement"[Title/Abstract] OR "knee arthroplasty"[Title/Abstract] OR "disease progression"[Title/Abstract] OR "structural progression"[Title/Abstract] OR "radiographic progression"[Title/Abstract] OR "symptom progression"[Title/Abstract] OR "joint space narrowing"[Title/Abstract] OR "cartilage loss"[Title/Abstract] OR "Arthroplasty, Replacement, Knee"[MeSH] OR "Disease Progression"[MeSH]) AND (predictor[Title/Abstract] OR "risk factor"[Title/Abstract] OR prognostic[Title/Abstract] OR prediction[Title/Abstract] OR "prediction model"[Title/Abstract] OR "prognostic model"[Title/Abstract] OR "risk prediction"[Title/Abstract] OR "outcome prediction"[Title/Abstract] OR prognosis[Title/Abstract] OR forecast[Title/Abstract] OR "Prognosis"[MeSH] OR "Risk Factors"[MeSH])) AND (English[Language]) AND (Humans[Mesh])

focused.description: Focused search for high-quality prediction studies
focused.query: (("knee osteoarthritis"[Title/Abstract] OR "knee OA"[Title/Abstract] OR "Osteoarthritis, Knee"[MeSH]) AND ("prediction model"[Title/Abstract] OR "prognostic model"[Title/Abstract] OR "risk prediction"[Title/Abstract] OR predictor[Title/Abstract] OR "risk factor"[Title/Abstract]) AND ("total knee replacement"[Title/Abstract] OR "total knee arthroplasty"[Title/Abstract] OR progression[Title/Abstract] OR TKR[Title/Abstract] OR TKA[Title/Abstract])) AND (English[Language]) AND (Humans[Mesh]) AND ("Clinical Trial"[Publication Type] OR "Cohort Studies"[Publication Type] OR "Systematic Review"[Publication Type])

current.query: ("knee osteoarthritis" OR "knee OA") AND ("progression" OR "total knee replacement" OR "arthroplasty" OR "TKR") AND (human[Filter])

medium_priority.description: Relevant, good quality, may be useful
